onboarding.welcomeDesc: Your smart kitchen companion that helps you manage food and reduce waste.
onboarding.pantryDesc: Add items manually or search our database. Keep track of everything in your kitchen with ease.
onboarding.expirationDesc: Get notified before food expires. Never waste food again with smart expiration tracking.
onboarding.shoppingDesc: Create and manage your shopping lists. Keep track of what you need to buy.
onboarding.wasteDesc: Smart expiration alerts keep you informed. Save money and help the planet by reducing food waste.

confirmEmail.info: The verification code expires in 24 hours. Make sure to check your spam folder if you don't see the email.
emailConfirmed.title: Email Verified!
emailConfirmed.description: Your email has been successfully verified. You can now sign in to your Nutrion account.
subscription.title: Unlock Premium Features
subscription.subtitle: Get full access to all features with our affordable subscription
subscription.feature1Desc: Track all your food items with expiration alerts and smart categorization
subscription.feature1Description: Track all your food items with expiration alerts and smart categorization
subscription.feature2Description: Get notified before items expire so you never waste food again

subscription.welcomeToPremium: Welcome to Nutrion Premium! You now have access to all premium features.

notifications.infoText: Notifications help you reduce food waste by alerting you before items expire. You can customize when and what notifications you receive.
language.title: Language
language.description: Choose your preferred language. The entire app will update immediately.

language.infoText: The app will update immediately when you select a new language. All screens, buttons, and text will be translated.
language.chooseLanguageDesc: Select your preferred language to get started. You can change this later in settings.
about.title: About Nutrion
about.description: Nutrion helps you manage your pantry, track food expiration dates, and reduce food waste.
about.madeWith: Made with ❤️ by the Nutrion Team
